tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    seed_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    seed_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    fertilizer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    fertilizer_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    pesticide_quantity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    farmer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    seed_id INTEGER REFERENCES seeds(seed_id),
    fertilizer_id INTEGER REFERENCES fertilizers(fertilizer_id),
    pesticide_id INTEGER REFERENCES pesticides(pesticide_id),
    quantity INTEGER
);
